授業目的: このゼミは死生学、宗教学、医療人類学について基礎的な知識を身に着けることを目的とする。
到達目標: 死生学、宗教学、医療人類学に関わる文献、概念、議論などについて知識を得、英語力（読む、聞く、話す）を養うことを目標とする。
授業方法: このゼミは英語で行われます。The primary language of instruction and discussion in the seminar will be English. However, we will occasionally use Japanese materials and allow Japanese discussion to understand difficult topics. In principle, the seminar will be student-led. Students will take turns leading a conversation on select topics and raising questions. The instructor will help facilitate discussion and occasionally provide short lectures to clarify important points.

トピック.授業計画1:
Session 1: Orientation
Session 2: Introduction
Session 3-14: Discussion of assigned texts, short lectures by the instructor, student presentations, etc.
(Sample topics: Suicide, Abortion, Pregnancy, Aging, Depression and Mental Health, Hospice Care)
We will also spend one class learning how to better utilize the library.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to do a close reading of the assigned text, and come to class prepared to raise questions and make comments. When it is their turn to help lead the discussion, some additional preparation time will be necessary.

評価.教科書Required texts0: The instructor will provide a variety of texts drawn from books, journals, newspapers, etc. We may also use some short video clips and documentary films.
評価.参考文献・資料Reference books0: The instructor will provide reference books as needed.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: The final grade will be based on attendance, quality of participation, discussion, presentations, and written work.
